SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener, ViewListener
public class ClientController extends Object implements ViewListener
Class responsible for managing communication between the network, model and view. It updates the virtual model, observes view and notify its updates. Furthermore, it receives user input and notifies the network of the request.
